page.title: 09Hometime
page.content: School finishes at three fifteen and we put up the chairs on the tables and say a prayer. Then go and get our coats and bags and line up outside by the gate. My dad or Mr Perry picks us up alternately week after week and drives us home in a car. At home I do lots of things like fishing, playing on my BMX bike or tennis and sometimes I watch TV. I normally watch some black and white films. At home we are all together. We have 12 ducks, about 3 chickens, 1 cockerel, and 1 nannygoat and we put them in their pens for the night at about 5 o' clock. It is my job to feed them. They have corn and bread. At about 5,30 I go in for tea.
